article_title: What Does an 'Eviction Pause' Really Mean?
article_description: States and cities around the country have decided to pause evictions and utility shutoffs during the coronavirus pandemic  But if you re at risk of being evicted  a moratorium may be only a temporary protection  Read more
article_content: States and cities around the country have decided to pause evictions and utility shutoffs during the coronavirus pandemic  But if youre at risk of being evicted  a moratorium may be only a temporary protection There are some issues with the accommodations s   2211 chars
